name: Organ Tangram
description:
Timo is employed at the organ donation service at St Andrews Hospital. But, he doesn't actually have many task to complete, because the hospital haven't received many donation lately.

Help him pass the time by completing five puzzles with human organs!

I developped Organ Tangram for the Perpignan Game Jam 2020 on GDevelop 5. The theme was "the donation".
It's the first videogame I developped by myself! During the week-end I made a functionnal version of the game, and later I polished it a bit (I added a personnalized mouse, a menu, transitions and the ending).

A big thanks to Manu, for the soundtrack, Pierre, for the help on GDevelop 5, and Phoebe, for the help on translation!
